languages.text: "Это же Эрдриг ван Торнстен, сенешаль Каллигоса Винтерскейла! Бог-Император, да его разрубили пополам одним ударом!"
"That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"
languages.original_text: "Это же Эрдриг ван Торнстен, сенешаль Каллигоса Винтерскейла! Бог-Император, да его разрубили пополам одним ударом!"

traits.locale_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"
"That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

"That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

languages.text: “这个人是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的总领，艾德瑞格·冯·托恩斯坦！神皇在上，他居然被一击劈成了两半！”
languages.original_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

traits.locale_text: “这个人是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的总领，艾德瑞格·冯·托恩斯坦！神皇在上，他居然被一击劈成了两半！”

languages.text: "Das ist der Truchsess von Calligos Winterzunder, Aerdrig van Tornsten! Beim Gottimperator, er wurde mit einem einzigen Hieb in zwei Hälften gespalten!"
languages.original_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist der Truchsess von Calligos Winterzunder, Aerdrig van Tornsten! Beim Gottimperator, er wurde mit einem einzigen Hieb in zwei Hälften gespalten!"

languages.text: «¡Ese de ahí es Aerdrig van Tornsten, el senescal de Calligos Winterscale! ¡Por el Dios Emperador, lo han partido en dos de un solo tajo!».
languages.original_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ese de ahí es Aerdrig van Tornsten, el senescal de Calligos Winterscale! ¡Por el Dios Emperador, lo han partido en dos de un solo tajo!».

languages.text: « C'est Aerdrig van Tornsten, le sénéchal de Calligos Winterscale ! Par l'Empereur-Dieu, il a été coupé en deux d'un seul coup ! »
languages.original_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est Aerdrig van Tornsten, le sénéchal de Calligos Winterscale ! Par l'Empereur-Dieu, il a été coupé en deux d'un seul coup ! »

languages.text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの家令長、エアドリグ・ヴァン・トルンステンだ！神帝陛下の一撃で真っ二つにされた！」
languages.original_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの家令長、エアドリグ・ヴァン・トルンステンだ！神帝陛下の一撃で真っ二つにされた！」

languages.text: "Calligos Winterscale'in Seneşali, Aerdrig van Tornsten bu! Tanrı İmparator adına, tek bir darbede ikiye ayrılmış!"
languages.original_text: "That's Calligos Winterscale's Seneschal, Aerdrig van Tornsten! By the God-Emperor, he was sliced in two with a single blow!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu Calligos Winterscale'in Seneşali, Aerdrig van Tornsten! Tanrı İmparator adına, tek bir darbede ikiye ayrılmış!"
